Title: BIDSbook
Project Description: • Useful for many data management of multiple data acquisition and sharing projects https://jupyterbook.org
Goals for Brainhack Montreal:
• Meet people
  • Brainstorm the ideas
  • Create a project stub
  • Write notebooks to generate generic figures from standard datasets for the jupyterbook
  • Create pages for BIDS (and maybe standard BIDS-apps derivatives).
Tech stack:
• JupyterBook
  • Datalad for crawling datasets metadata
  • PyBIDS to query datasets content
  • Github action setup to automate build.
Things to do after the project is submit: • [ ] Short summary of your project pitch to present during the hackathon.
